message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $950000 for this exceptional item.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to counter with an offer of $925000 for the product. We hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of our item.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think we can do better. I'm willing to go up to $920000, but I'd like to get closer to my target price. Can you meet me in the middle at $915000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We've considered your proposal and would like to counter with a price of $922500 for the product. We hope this offer is more acceptable to you while still reflecting the value of our item.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm getting closer to my target, but I still need to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $918750. Can we shake on it at this price?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We've reviewed it carefully and are proposing a price of $921250 for the product. This reflects the value of our item while allowing us to close the deal. We hope this meets your expectations.
I'm getting close, but I still need to save some money. I'm willing to go up to $920000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We've considered it and are proposing a final price of $921875 for the product. This price reflects the value of our item and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $920000. I think we've been negotiating long enough, and I'd like to make a serious offer. Can you meet me at this price?
